description: Source code for a React component implementing a Tic Tac Toe game, including game state management, user interaction handling, and UI rendering.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Function to determine if there is a winner based on the current board state.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on game cells, updates game state, and checks for win/draw conditions.

methods.name: restartGame
methods.description: Resets the game to its initial state, allowing for a new game.
